about_the_game:
Return to the world of Meow Moments with our Valentine's Day DLC!
Explore a vibrant garden bursting with love. Dive into heartwarming scenes—romantic picnics, sweet serenades, and lively craft spots.
Meet a diverse cast of characters, all celebrating love in their unique ways.
This DLC adds a dose of heartfelt moments to your Meow Moments experience. Join us in spreading love and joy in Meow Moments: Valentine's Day DLC.

By purchasing this DLC, you can:
  • Play a brand-new scene in the main game.
  • Add the Valentine’s Day content to your creations in the Community and Creative Maker. You can mix items from all the scenes you own in the same scene!
  • Play the scenes created by other players in the Community that include Valentine’s Day items.

You will also support us to create more content and more games!
Thanks in advance!
detailed_description:
Return to the world of Meow Moments with our Valentine's Day DLC!
Explore a vibrant garden bursting with love. Dive into heartwarming scenes—romantic picnics, sweet serenades, and lively craft spots.
Meet a diverse cast of characters, all celebrating love in their unique ways.
This DLC adds a dose of heartfelt moments to your Meow Moments experience. Join us in spreading love and joy in Meow Moments: Valentine's Day DLC.

By purchasing this DLC, you can:
  • Play a brand-new scene in the main game.
  • Add the Valentine’s Day content to your creations in the Community and Creative Maker. You can mix items from all the scenes you own in the same scene!
  • Play the scenes created by other players in the Community that include Valentine’s Day items.

You will also support us to create more content and more games!
Thanks in advance!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Monterey 12.3.+
  • Processor: 2.3 Ghz Dual Core - Intel only
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Meow Moments: Valentine's Day

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 2.3 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT550M | AMD Radeon R7/HD 5650 | Intel HD 520
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Experience love in every corner! Join our feline friends and diverse characters in a charming Valentine's Day garden. Engage in heartwarming activities, from picnics to romantic serenades, in this delightful DLC for Meow Moments: Celebrating Together.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
